allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: [TENANT-001] Add TenantService with CRUD operations

- TenantService with createTenant, getTenant, updateTenant, deleteTenant
- Zod schemas for tenant validation \(CreateTenantSchema, UpdateTenantSchema\)
- Tenant ID generation using tenant_xxx format
- Integration with AuthRepository for strong consistency

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(powershell -Command "cd C:\\codingFiles\\orkait\\orka-auth; git add prd.json progress.txt; git commit -m ''feat: INFRA-002 verified - removeDeadCode, removeComments, refactor, qualityCheck, verifyWorking

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>''")

Bash(powershell -Command "cd C:\\codingFiles\\orkait\\orka-auth; git add prd.json progress.txt; git commit -m ''feat: INFRA-003 verified - removeDeadCode, removeComments, refactor, qualityCheck, verifyWorking

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>''")

Bash(powershell -Command "cd C:\\codingFiles\\orkait\\orka-auth; git add prd.json progress.txt; git commit -m 'feat: TENANT-001, TENANT-002 verified - removeDeadCode, removeComments, refactor, qualityCheck, verifyWorking

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>'":*)
Bash(cmd.exe /c "npx wrangler d1 execute orkait_auth --local --file migrations/0007_optimize_indexes.sql")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "npx wrangler d1 execute orkait_auth --local --file migrations/0007_optimize_indexes.sql")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "npx wrangler d1 execute orkait_auth --local --command ""SELECT name, tbl_name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=''index'' AND name LIKE ''idx_%'' ORDER BY tbl_name, name""")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "npx wrangler d1 execute orkait_auth --local --command ""EXPLAIN QUERY PLAN SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE user_id = ''test'' AND revoked_at IS NULL""")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "npx wrangler d1 execute orkait_auth --local --command ""EXPLAIN QUERY PLAN SELECT * FROM refresh_tokens WHERE token_hash = ''test'' AND revoked_at IS NULL""")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "npx wrangler d1 execute orkait_auth --local --command ""CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_sessions_user_tenant_service_active ON sessions\(user_id, tenant_id, service\) WHERE revoked_at IS NULL""")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "npx wrangler d1 execute orkait_auth --local --command ""CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_sessions_user_service_active ON sessions\(user_id, service\) WHERE revoked_at IS NULL""")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "npx wrangler d1 execute orkait_auth --local --command ""EXPLAIN QUERY PLAN SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE user_id = ''u1'' AND tenant_id IS ''t1'' AND service = ''web'' AND revoked_at IS NULL""")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "npx wrangler d1 execute orkait_auth --local --command ""EXPLAIN QUERY PLAN SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE user_id = ''u1'' AND tenant_id IS NULL AND service = ''web'' AND revoked_at IS NULL""")
Bash(powershell -Command "cd C:\\codingFiles\\orkait\\orka-auth; ''d8025b5d72f5951be745a48acd58e29c0b142dc57cf361a4f6b70608ec865f93'' | npx wrangler secret put JWT_SECRET")
Bash(powershell -Command "cd C:\\codingFiles\\orkait\\orka-auth; ''8fcc38dee2315a5dd4479daf6fc79720b34027aa101c8f7f'' | npx wrangler secret put INTERNAL_SECRET")

Bash(powershell -Command "$body = @{ email = ''test-verify@example.com''; password = ''TestPassword123!''; name = ''Test User'' } | ConvertTo-Json; Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''https://orkait-auth.aconite.workers.dev/api/auth/signup'' -Method POST -ContentType ''application/json'' -Body $body")
